    • getCampsByStartingAlphabet

      public List<Camp> getCampsByStartingAlphabet(CampController campController, String startingAlphabet)
      Retrieves a list of camps whose names start with the specified alphabet.
      Specified by:
      getCampsByStartingAlphabet in interface CampServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      campController - The CampController object used to access the camps.
      startingAlphabet - The alphabet used to filter the camps by their names.
      Returns:
      A list of Camp objects whose names start with the specified alphabet. Returns null if no camps are found.
